question: you work for a large corporation. You want to apply for one month's leave owing to illness. Write to your manager requesting leave for the same. In your letter • introduce yourself • describe about your illness • inform the manager how you intend to manage your job assignment in your absence
text: I am writing this letter with the pain to inform you about my illness due to severe back pain hence, I would like to apply for a month's leave as I need to take complete bed rest as per the doctor's suggestion. Furthermore, I need to take a huge medication and I am worried about my health.

As you know, I am working on a brand new project which got assigned a few days ago. Therefore, I strongly decided to continue the work despite my health condition and this would be a phenomenal opportunity for all of us as we are going to work with a reputed client in the industry. However, if required I am ready to extend my support at night time as well and I am sure we will execute this project in an Immaculate way.
Last but not the least, by any chance if am not available online, then please do not hesitate to call me on my mobile  I am happy to assist  our team and client as well.
I look forward to seeing your support during my sick leave. I hope we will deliver the work without any issues.
